languages.text: "Я... не могла просто так рассказать. Дело о явленном лично мне знамении, понимаете? Я сказала преподобному Иеронимусу истинную правду — что отправляюсь в персональное паломничество дабы укрепить свой дух. Это и было паломничество — святая Арджента будто сама указала мне путь, велела пройти испытание. Отыщи я корабль и сумей войти под его своды, прикоснуться к мощам и реликвии — это было бы знаком, что я действительно отмечена особым вниманием святой".

traits.locale_text: "Я... не могла просто так рассказать. Дело о явленном лично мне знамении, понимаете? Я сказала преподобному Зандору истинную правду — что отправляюсь в персональное паломничество дабы укрепить свой дух. Это и было паломничество — Святая Арджента будто сама указала мне путь, велела пройти испытание. Отыщи я корабль и сумей войти под его своды, прикоснуться к мощам и реликвии — это было бы знаком, что я действительно отмечена особым вниманием святой".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."
languages.original_text: "Я... не могла просто так рассказать. Дело о явленном лично мне знамении, понимаете? Я сказала преподобному Иеронимусу истинную правду — что отправляюсь в персональное паломничество дабы укрепить свой дух. Это и было паломничество — святая Арджента будто сама указала мне путь, велела пройти испытание. Отыщи я корабль и сумей войти под его своды, прикоснуться к мощам и реликвии — это было бы знаком, что я действительно отмечена особым вниманием святой".

traits.locale_text: "I... couldn't just up and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Hieronimus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was like Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanded me to take on this trial. Were I to find the ship and enter its abode, were I to lay my hand on the remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly was marked with the Saint's attention."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我……我没有办法对他说出一切详情。你不明白吗？这个启示是透露给我自己的。我对希罗尼穆斯牧师说了实话，我告诉他我准备独自进行一场朝圣之旅，以此增强我的精神力量。那也确实是一场朝圣之旅，仿佛圣阿洁塔亲自为我指明了方向，命令我参加这场试炼。如果我真的找到了那艘飞船，踏上了它的甲板，如果我真的能把我的双手放在她的圣体与遗物上，这就代表我真的得到了圣人的眷顾。”
languages.original_text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."

traits.locale_text: “我……我没有办法对他说出一切详情。你不明白吗？这个启示是透露给我自己的。我对希罗尼穆斯牧师说了实话，我告诉他我准备独自进行一场朝圣之旅，以此增强我的精神力量。那也确实是一场朝圣之旅，仿佛圣阿洁塔亲自为我指明了方向，命令我参加这场试炼。如果我真的找到了那艘飞船，踏上了它的甲板，如果我真的能把我的双手放在她的圣体与遗物上，这就代表我真的得到了圣人的眷顾。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «No podía... decírselo así, sin más. Fue un portento, una revelación personal, ¿lo entiende? Le conté al reverendo Hieronymus la verdad: que iba a emprender un peregrinaje personal para reforzar mi espíritu. Es cierto, era un peregrinaje; era como si la propia santa Argenta me enseñara el camino y me ordenara superar esta prueba. Si hubiera encontrado esta nave y puesto pie en su cubierta, si hubiera llegado a tocar sus restos y su reliquia, sería señal de que había sido bendita por el favor de la santa».
languages.original_text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."

traits.locale_text: «No podía... decírselo así, sin más. Fue un portento, una revelación personal, ¿lo entiende? Le conté al reverendo Hieronymus la verdad: que iba a emprender un peregrinaje personal para reforzar mi espíritu. Es cierto, era un peregrinaje; era como si la propia santa Argenta me enseñara el camino y me ordenara superar esta prueba. Si hubiera encontrado esta nave y puesto pie en su cubierta, si hubiera llegado a tocar sus restos y su reliquia, sería señal de que había sido bendita por el favor de la santa».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我は…出ていって告げることはできませんでした。それは、個人的に啓示された前兆でした。我はヒエロニムス司祭に正直に本当のことを話しました…自分の精神を奮い立たせるために個人的な巡礼の旅に出るのだと。それは本当に巡礼の旅でした。まるで聖アルジェンタ自身が我に道を示し、この試練を引き受けるように命じたかのようでした。もし我が船を見つけ、その甲板に足を踏み入れたなら、もし我が彼女の遺影と聖遺物に手を置いたなら…それは我が本当に聖女の加護を受けたという証になっただろう」
languages.original_text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."

traits.locale_text: 「我は…出ていって告げることはできませんでした。それは、個人的に啓示された前兆でした。我はヒエロニムス司祭に正直に本当のことを話しました…自分の精神を奮い立たせるために個人的な巡礼の旅に出るのだと。それは本当に巡礼の旅でした。まるで聖アルジェンタ自身が我に道を示し、この試練を引き受けるように命じたかのようでした。もし我が船を見つけ、その甲板に足を踏み入れたなら、もし我が彼女の遺影と聖遺物に手を置いたなら…それは我が本当に聖女の加護を受けたという証になっただろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... konnte es ihm nicht einfach sagen. Das Omen hatte sich mir persönlich offenbart, versteht Ihr? Ich habe Reverend Hieronymus die Wahrheit gesagt – dass ich eine persönliche Pilgerfahrt antreten wolle, um meinen Geist zu stärken. Es war in der Tat eine Pilgerfahrt – als hätte die Heilige Argenta mir persönlich den Weg gezeigt und mir befohlen, diese Prüfung anzutreten. Hätte ich das Schiff gefunden und seine Decks betreten, hätte ich meine Hand auf ihre Überreste und das Relikt gelegt – dann wäre das ein Zeichen gewesen, dass ich tatsächlich mit der Gunst der Heiligen gesegnet worden war."
languages.original_text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... konnte es ihm nicht einfach sagen. Das Omen hatte sich mir persönlich offenbart, versteht Ihr? Ich habe Reverend Hieronymus die Wahrheit gesagt – dass ich eine persönliche Pilgerfahrt antreten wolle, um meinen Geist zu stärken. Es war in der Tat eine Pilgerfahrt – als hätte die Heilige Argenta mir persönlich den Weg gezeigt und mir befohlen, diese Prüfung anzutreten. Hätte ich das Schiff gefunden und seine Decks betreten, hätte ich meine Hand auf ihre Überreste und das Relikt gelegt – dann wäre das ein Zeichen gewesen, dass ich tatsächlich mit der Gunst der Heiligen gesegnet worden war."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Je... n'ai pas voulu entrer dans les détails. C'était un présage qui m'avait été révélé, à moi et à personne d'autre, comprenez-vous ? Mais je n'ai pas menti au révérend Hiéronymus, je lui ai dit que je partais en pèlerinage personnel pour renforcer mon esprit, et c'est bien d'un pèlerinage qu'il s'agissait. J'avais le sentiment que Sainte Argenta elle-même m'avait montré le chemin et m'ordonnait de passer cette épreuve. Si je trouvais le vaisseau et marchais sur ses ponts, si je mettais la main sur la dépouille de la sainte et sa relique, alors ça serait la preuve qu'elle m'avait réellement accordé sa faveur. »
languages.original_text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."

traits.locale_text: « Je... n'ai pas voulu entrer dans les détails. C'était un présage qui m'avait été révélé, à moi et à personne d'autre, comprenez-vous ? Mais je n'ai pas menti au révérend Hiéronymus, je lui ai dit que je partais en pèlerinage personnel pour renforcer mon esprit, et c'est bien d'un pèlerinage qu'il s'agissait. J'avais le sentiment que Sainte Argenta elle-même m'avait montré le chemin et m'ordonnait de passer cette épreuve. Si je trouvais le vaisseau et marchais sur ses ponts, si je mettais la main sur la dépouille de la sainte et sa relique, alors ça serait la preuve qu'elle m'avait réellement accordé sa faveur. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ona... Bunu söylemeye dilim varmadı. Bu aydınlanma, şahsıma bahşedildi. Anlamıyor musun? Muhterem Hieronymus'a dürüstçe gerçeği söyledim. Ruhumu güçlendirmek için kutsal bir yolculuğa çıkacağımı... Kelimenin tam anlamıyla kutsal bir yolculuktu bu. Azize Argenta, bana bizzat yol gösteriyordu. Bu imtihandan geçmemi istiyordu sanki... Gemiyi bulup güvertesine adım atsam, kalıntılarını ve yadigârını ele geçirebilsem... Gerçekten azizenin lütfuyla kutsandığımın emaresi olacaktı."
languages.original_text: "I... couldn't just come out and tell him. It was a portent revealed to me personally, can't you see? I told Reverend Hieronymus the honest truth — that I was going on a personal pilgrimage to embolden my spirit. It really was a pilgrimage — it was as if Saint Argenta herself had shown me the way, commanding me to undertake this trial. If I had found the ship and set foot on its decks, if I had laid my hand on her remains and the relic — it would have been a sign that I truly had been blessed with the saint's favour."

traits.locale_text: "Ona… Bunu söylemeye dilim varmadı. Bu aydınlanma, benim şahsıma bahşedildi. Anlamıyor musun? Muhterem Hieronymus'a dürüstçe gerçeği söyledim. Ruhumu güçlendirmek için kutsal bir yolculuğa çıkacağımı… Kelimenin tam anlamıyla kutsal bir yolculuktu. Azize Argenta, bana bizzat yol gösteriyordu. Bu imtihandan geçmemi istiyordu sanki… Gemiyi bulup güvertesine adım atsaydım, kalıntılarını ve yadigârını ele geçirebilseydim… Gerçekten azizenin lütfuyla kutsandığımın bir emaresi olacaktı."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
